c3py.padding¶

class c3py.padding.Padding¶

Control the padding around the chart.

set(left, right, top, bottom)¶

Set the chart’s padding.

Parameters:
  • left (int) – The chart’s left padding.
  • right (int) – The chart’s right padding.
  • top (int) – The chart’s top padding.
  • bottom (int) – The chart’s bottom padding.
Returns:
Return type:

None
